1101011000111000 1001110100101001 1 -> sum: 0111001101100010, cout: 1
0001011010000101 0010001110010011 0 -> sum: 0011101000011000, cout: 0
0101001011111100 0010011111111100 0 -> sum: 0111101011111000, cout: 0
1110000111000000 1110101100110010 1 -> sum: 1100110011110011, cout: 1
0100011101101101 0110000111011101 0 -> sum: 1010100101001010, cout: 0
1110100011000100 1010111100100001 1 -> sum: 1001011111100110, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
